{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Mimosa |model=A5 |revision=c |fcc_date=08/11/2016 |is_manuf=No |type=industrial access point |fcc_id=2ABZJ-100-00037 |ic_id=11823A-10000037 |pwr_poe=at |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (half), |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_module=Atheros AR5BHB116 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (half) |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9382 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |flags=MU-MIMO, Wave2, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|5GHz Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.mimosa.co/products/a5c}}
"2.4 GHz 802.11b/g/n radio for local management access" - Presumably what the [[Atheros AR5BHB116]] module is for.
